title.bibl: El Ideal Mexicano, Vol IV. No 17. Feb. 14, 1937. Lent Devotions

div.bibl: El Ideal Mexicano, Vol IV. No 17. Feb. 14, 1937. LENT DEVOTIONS

body.p: Service at the Mexican Catholic Church of St. Francis, 12th Street and Newberry Avenue. Masses every morning at 7:00 and 8:00 o'clock. Masses on Sunday take place at 6, 8, 9, 10 and 11:30 in the morning. Sunday at 3:00 P. M. stations of the Cross, also on Wednesdays and Fridays at 3:00 P. M. Rosary daily at 7:00 P. M. and the Holy-Hour every Thursday at 7:00 P. M.

Don. Jose de Jesus Manriquez y Zarate, a Mexican Archbishop, will officiate from Feb. 14 to March 21. There will be a mass daily at 8:00 o'clock. Mission for children every day at . Mission for all the Mexican Catholics every day at 7:00 P. M.
